title: Looking To Buy A Few Old Judge Cards
author: kkkkandp

posts.post_title: Looking To Buy A Few Old Judge Cards
posts.post_content:
I am trying to acquire the following players and/or managers: 

William Barnie; Pete Connell; William Holbert (Jersey City pose 230-6); Rudy Kemmler (prefer Saint Paul pose 258-2, but will settle for Browns version); Harry Lyons (Jersey City pose 284-5); James Roseman; Dave Rowe (portraits 393-1 or 393-7 or 393-5 stooping to field grounder); William Sharsig; William Watkins.

Send info to [url]kkkkandp@aol.com[/url].

Thanks!
